name: Absol
author: Anesaki Dynamic
flavor_text: Long ago, superstitions were spread about it, saying it brought disaster. This fed a hatred of it, and it was driven deep into the mountains.

attacks.name: Future Sight
attacks.effect: Look at the top 4 cards of either player’s deck and put them back in any order.

attacks.name: Doom News
attacks.effect: Put all Energy attached to this Pokémon into your hand. At the end of your opponent’s next turn, the Defending Pokémon will be Knocked Out.
